data.title: The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association
data.meta_description: In 2022, Jason Terry became an Assistant Coach for the Utah Jazz.
data.meta_site_name: The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association |
data.text: In 2022, Jason Terry became an Assistant Coach for the Utah Jazz. Coach Terry was born in Seattle, Washington and played for and graduated from the University of Arizona. He was selected 10th overall in the 1999 NBA Draft by the Atlanta Hawks and had a 19-year NBA career with stops in Atlanta, Dallas, Boston, Brooklyn, Houston, and Milwaukee. Coach Terry and his wife, Johnyika, have five children (Jasa, Jrue, Jasionna, Jalayah, & Jaida).
